# The `LLVMRemarkStreamer` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Streamer for LLVM remarks which has logic for dealing with <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticinfo">DiagnosticInfo</a> objects. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Streamer for LLVM remarks which has logic for dealing with <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticinfo">DiagnosticInfo</a> objects.

Definition at line 34 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/llvmremarkstreamer-h">LLVMRemarkStreamer.h</a>.

## Private Member Functions

### toRemark() {#a2a52bafa66c1dd5c5746378dd387bd38}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>remarks::Remark LLVMRemarkStreamer::toRemark (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticinfooptimizationbase">DiagnosticInfoOptimizationBase</a> &amp; Diag) const</>}>
Convert diagnostics into remark objects.

LLVM Diagnostic -&gt; Remark.

The lifetime of the members of the result is bound to the lifetime of the LLVM diagnostics.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/llvmremarkstreamer-h/#l00039">39</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/llvmremarkstreamer-h">LLVMRemarkStreamer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/llvmremarkstreamer-cpp/#l00061">61</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/llvmremarkstreamer-cpp">LLVMRemarkStreamer.cpp</a>.
